00048 
00049 #include <stdio.h>
00050 #include "midas.h"
00051 #include "mcstd.h"
00052 
00053 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 
00055 /*
00056   Base address of PC card. Must match jumper setting:
00057   ===================================================
00058 
00059   ADDRESS SA9-SA4
00060   c=close=on=0
00061   o=open=off=1
00062 
00063   0x380 -> oo occc (11 1000)
00064   0x2f0 -> oc oooo (10 1111)
00065   0x280 -> oc occc (10 1000)
00066 */
00067 
00068 #define CAMAC_BASE 0x280
00069 
00070 #define CSR CAMAC_BASE+0
00071 #define MCR CAMAC_BASE+0x2
00072 #define CCR CAMAC_BASE+0x4
00073 #define NAF CAMAC_BASE+0x6
00074 #define DLR CAMAC_BASE+0x8
00075 #define DHR CAMAC_BASE+0xa
00076 #define SRR CAMAC_BASE+0xc
00077 #define TCR CAMAC_BASE+0xe
00078 
00079 /* Control/Status Register (CSR) Bit Fields */
00080 #define GO              0x01    /* Start a data transfer        */
00081 #define NOQ             0x02    /* Q status of last operation   */
00082 #define NOX             0x04    /* X status of last operation   */
00083 #define ID1             0x08    /* Interface ID1 + ID 2 Ro      */
00084 #define ID2             0x10
00085 #define DONE_ENABLE     0x40    /* Done interrupt enable RW */
00086 #define DONE            0x80    /* Done Ro */
00087 #define RFS_ENABLE      0x100   /* Request For Service Int Enable RW */
00088 #define RFS             0x200   /* LAM is Pending Ro */
00089 #define PP              0x400   /* Parallel Poll Wo */
00090 #define RESET           0x1000  /* Reset Interface Wo */
00091 #define TMO             0x2000  /* Timeout info Ro */
00092 #define ABT             0x4000  /* Abort info Ro */
00093 #define CERROR          0x8000  /* Error = TMO + ABT Ro */
00094 #define CSR_RESET_VALUE (DONE | NOX | NOQ)
00095 #define MCR_RESET_VALUE 0x00
00096 
00097 /* Mode Control Register (MCR) Bit Fields 15-6 not used */
00098 #define AD              0x01    /* Disable Abort on DMA tfer    */
00099 #define WS1             0x02    /* Word size                    */
00100 #define WS2             0x04    /* 00=24bit 01=16bit 10=8bit    */
00101 #define TM1             0x08    /* DMA transfer mode            */
00102 #define TM2             0x10    /* 00:Q-stop,   01:Q-ignore
00103                                    10:Q-repeat, 11:Q-scan       */
00104 #define BM              0x20    /* Block transfer mode          */
00105 
00106 #define WS_24BIT        0x00
00107 #define WS_16BIT        WS1
00108 #define WS_8BIT         WS2
00109 
00110 #define Q_STOP_BITS     0x00
00111 #define Q_IGNORE_BITS   TM1
00112 #define Q_REPEAT_BITS   TM2
00113 #define Q_SCAN_BITS     (TM1 | TM2)
00114 
00115 
00116 /* CAMAC Crate Address Register (CCR) field 0-2 for crate 0-7*/
00117 #define CRATE_FIELD     0x03
00118 
00119 /* CAMAC Command Register (NAF) */
00120 /* 32 functions 
00121    F16 F8 Op
00122     0   0 Read
00123     0   1 Control
00124     1   0 Write
00125     1   1 Control */
00126 
00127 #define A_FIELD         0x01E0  /* 16 sub addresses */
00128 #define A_SHIFT         5
00129 #define N_FIELD         0x3E00  /* 32 slots */
00130 #define N_SHIFT         9
00131 #define F_FIELD         0x1F    /* 32 functions */
00132 #define RDNAF           0x8000  /* READ NAF Wo Initiate K-bus NAF */
00133 
00134 /* Bit fields in the 3922 Status Register */
00135 #define ZINIT          0x0001
00136 #define CLEAR                0x0002
00137 #define INHIBIT            0x0004
00138 #define D_INHIBIT          0x0040
00139 #define BUFFER_MODE      0x0080
00140 #define ENABLE_SRQ       0x0100
00141 #define INT_L24            0x0200
00142 #define OFFLINE            0x2000
00143 #define LAM_PRESENT  0x8000
00144 
00145 /* CAMAC DATA LOW  Register (DL)  lower 16bit data */
00146 /* CAMAC DATA HIGH Register (DH)  upper 8bit data */
00147 /* SERVICE Request Register (SRR) bit wise crate selection bit 0-7*/
00148 /* Transfer Count Register (TCR) 0-15 Number of 16bit word to be transfered */
00149 
00150 /*
00151   Interrupt request selection. Must match jumper setting:
00152   =======================================================
00153   Switch IRQ2-7
00154 */
00155 
00156 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00157 
00158 #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
00159 #include <dos.h>
00160 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outportb(_p, _d)
00161 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outport(_p, _d)
00162 #define INP(_p) inportb(_p)
00163 #define INPW(_p) inport(_p)
00164 #elif defined( _MSC_VER )
00165 #include <windows.h>
00166 #include <conio.h>
00167 #define OUTP(_p, _d) _outp((unsigned short) (_p), (int) (_d))
00168 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) _outpw((unsigned short) (_p), (unsigned short) (_d))
00169 #define INP(_p) _inp((unsigned short) (_p))
00170 #define INPW(_p) _inpw((unsigned short) (_p))
00171 #elif defined(OS_LINUX)
00172 #include <asm/io.h>
00173 #include <unistd.h>
00174 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outb(_d, _p)
00175 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outw(_d, _p)
00176 #define INP(_p) inb(_p)
00177 #define INPW(_p) inw(_p)
00178 #endif
00179 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180 INLINE void cam8i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, unsigned char *d)
00181 {
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00185 INLINE void cami(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00186 {
00187    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00188    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00189    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00190    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00191    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00192    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00193    *d = INPW(DLR);
00194 }
00195 
00196 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00197 INLINE void cam16i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00198 {
00199    cami(c, n, a, f, d);
00200 }
00201 
00202 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00203 INLINE void cam24i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD * d)
00204 {
00205    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00206    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00207    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00208    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00209    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00210    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00211    *((unsigned short *) d) = INPW(DLR);
00212    *((unsigned char *) d + 2) = INP(DHR);
00213 }
00214 
00215 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00216 INLINE void cam8i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00217                     unsigned char *d, int *x, int *q)
00218 {
00219    printf("cam8i_q not implemented\n");
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00223 INLINE void cam16i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00224                      WORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00225 {
00226    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00227    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00228    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00229    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00230    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00231    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00232    *((unsigned short *) d) = INPW(DLR);
00233    *q = (((INPW(CSR) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00234    *x = (((INPW(CSR) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00235 }
00236 
00237 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00238 INLINE void cam24i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00239                      DWORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00240 {
00241    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00242    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00243    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00244    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00245    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00246    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00247    *((unsigned short *) d) = INPW(DLR);
00248    *((unsigned char *) d + 2) = INP(DHR);
00249    *d &= 0x00ffffff;
00250    *q = (((INPW(CSR) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00251    *x = (((INPW(CSR) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00252 }
00253 
00254 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00255 INLINE void cam16i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00256                      WORD ** d, const int r)
00257 {
00258    WORD i;
00259 
00260    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00261    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00262    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00263    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00264    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00265       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00266       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00267       *((unsigned short *) (*d)) = INPW(DLR);
00268       (*d)++;
00269    }
00270 }
00271 
00272 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00273 INLINE void cam24i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00274                      DWORD ** d, const int r)
00275 {
00276    WORD i;
00277 
00278    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00279    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00280    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00281    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00282    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00283       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00284       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00285       *((unsigned short *) (*d)) = INPW(DLR);
00286       *(((unsigned char *) *d) + 2) = INP(DHR);
00287       **(d) &= 0x00ffffff;
00288       (*d)++;
00289    }
00290 }
00291 
00292 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00293 INLINE void cam16i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00294                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00295 {
00296    int i, x, q;
00297 
00298    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00299       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00300       if (!q) {
00301          (*d)--;
00302          break;
00303       }
00304    }
00305 }
00306 
00307 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308 INLINE void cam24i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00309                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00310 {
00311    int i, x, q;
00312 
00313    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00314       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00315       if (!q) {
00316          (*d)--;
00317          break;
00318       }
00319    }
00320 }
00321 
00322 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00323 INLINE void cam16i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00324                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00325 {
00326    WORD i, aa;
00327 
00328    aa = a;
00329    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00330    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00331    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00332       OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (aa << A_SHIFT) | f);
00333       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00334       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00335       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00336       *((unsigned short *) (*d)) = INPW(DLR);
00337       aa++;
00338       (*d)++;
00339    }
00340 }
00341 
00342 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00343 INLINE void cam24i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00344                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00345 {
00346    WORD i, aa;
00347 
00348    aa = a;
00349    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00350    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00351    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00352       OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (aa << A_SHIFT) | f);
00353       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00354       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00355       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00356       *((unsigned short *) (*d)) = INPW(DLR);
00357       *(((unsigned char *) *d) + 2) = INP(DHR);
00358       **(d) &= 0x00ffffff;
00359       aa++;
00360       (*d)++;
00361    }
00362 }

00390 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00391 INLINE void camo(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD d)
00392 {
00393    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00394    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00395    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00396    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00397    OUTPW(DLR, d);
00398    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00399    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00400 }

00404 {
00405    camo(c, n, a, f, d);
00406 }

00408 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00409 INLINE void cam24o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD d)
00410 {
00411    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00412    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00413    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00414    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00415    OUTPW(DLR, (unsigned short) d);
00416    OUTP(DHR, *(((unsigned char *) (&d)) + 2));
00417    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00418    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00419 }
00420 
00421 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00422 INLINE void cam16o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00423                      WORD d, int *x, int *q)
00424 {
00425    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00426    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00427    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00428    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00429    OUTPW(DLR, (unsigned short) d);
00430    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00431    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00432    *q = (((INPW(CSR) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00433    *x = (((INPW(CSR) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00434 }
00435 
00436 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00437 INLINE void cam24o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00438                      DWORD d, int *x, int *q)
00439 {
00440    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00441    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00442    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00443    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00444    OUTPW(DLR, (unsigned short) d);
00445    OUTP(DHR, *(((unsigned char *) (&d)) + 2));
00446    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00447    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00448    *q = (((INPW(CSR) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00449    *x = (((INPW(CSR) >> 2) & 1) ^ 1);
00450 }

00458 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00459 INLINE void cam16o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00460                      WORD * d, const int r)
00461 {
00462    int i;
00463 
00464    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00465    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00466    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00467    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00468    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00469       OUTPW(DLR, *((unsigned short *) d));
00470       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00471       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00472    }
00473 }
00474 
00475 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00476 INLINE void cam24o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00477                      DWORD * d, const int r)
00478 {
00479    WORD i;
00480 
00481    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00482    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00483    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00484    OUTPW(MCR, WS_24BIT);
00485    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00486       OUTPW(DLR, *((unsigned short *) d));
00487       OUTP(DHR, *(((unsigned char *) (&d)) + 2));
00488       OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00489       while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00490    }
00491 }
00492 
00493 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00494 INLINE int camc_chk(const int c)
00495 {
00496    unsigned int naf, n, a, f;
00497 
00498    /* clear inhibit */
00499    camc(c, 1, 2, 32);
00500 
00501    /* read back naf */
00502    OUTPW(NAF, RDNAF);
00503    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00504    naf = INPW(NAF);
00505    n = ((naf >> N_SHIFT) & N_FIELD);
00506    a = ((naf >> A_SHIFT) & A_FIELD);
00507    f = naf & F_FIELD;
00508    if (n != 1 || a != 2 || f != 32)
00509       return -1;
00510 
00511    return 0;
00512 }
00513 
00514 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00515 INLINE void camc(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f)
00516 {
00517    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00518    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00519    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00520    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00521    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00522    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00523 }
00524 
00525 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00526 INLINE void camc_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, int *q)
00527 {
00528    OUTPW(CCR, c);
00529    OUTPW(NAF, (n << N_SHIFT) | (a << A_SHIFT) | f);
00530    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00531    OUTPW(MCR, WS_16BIT);
00532    OUTPW(CSR, GO);
00533    while (!(INPW(CSR) & DONE));
00534    *q = (((INPW(CSR) >> 1) & 1) ^ 1);
00535 }
00536 
00537 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00538 INLINE void camc_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00539 {
00540    int i;
00541 
00542    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00543       camc(c, n, a + i, f);
00544 }
00545 
00546 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00547 INLINE void camc_sn(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00548 {
00549    int i;
00550 
00551    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00552       camc(c, n + i, a, f);
00553 }

00555 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00556 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00557 static HANDLE _hdio = 0;
00558 #endif
00559 
00560 INLINE int cam_init(void)
00561 {
00562 
00563 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00564    OSVERSIONINFO vi;
00565    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00566    DWORD size;
00567 
00568    vi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO);
00569    GetVersionEx(&vi);
00570 
00571    /* use DirectIO driver under NT to gain port access */
00572    if (vi.dwPlatformId == VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_NT) {
00573       _hdio = CreateFile("\\\\.\\directio", GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
00574                          OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);
00575       if (_hdio == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00576          return -1;
00577    }
00578 
00579    if (!DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00580                         NULL, 0, &size, NULL))
00581       return -1;
00582 #endif                          // _MSC_VER
00583 #ifdef OS_LINUX
00584    /* 
00585       In order to access the IO ports of the CAMAC interface, one needs
00586       to call the ioperm() function for those ports. This requires root
00587       privileges. For normal operation, this is performed by the "dio"
00588       program, which is a "setuid" program having temporarily root privi-
00589       lege. So the frontend is started with "dio frontend". Since the
00590       frontend cannot be debugged through the dio program, we suplly here
00591       the direct ioperm call which requires the program to be run as root,
00592       making it possible to debug it. The program has then to be compiled
00593       with "gcc -DDO_IOPERM -o frontend frontend.c kcs2927.c ..."
00594     */
00595 
00596 #ifdef DO_IOPERM
00597    ioperm(0x80, 1, 1);
00598    if (ioperm(CAMAC_BASE, 4 * 0x10, 1) < 0)
00599       printf("hyt1331.c: Cannot call ioperm() (no root privileges)\n");
00600 #endif
00601 
00602 #endif
00603    return SUCCESS;
00604 }
00605 
00606 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00607 INLINE void cam_exit(void)
00608 {
00609 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00610    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00611    DWORD size;
00612 
00613    if (_hdio <= 0)
00614       return;
00615 
00616    DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00617                    NULL, 0, &size, NULL);
00618 #endif
00619 }
00620 
00621 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00622 INLINE void cam_inhibit_set(const int c)
00623 {
00624    WORD ccsr;
00625 
00626    cam16i(c, 30, 0, 1, &ccsr);
00627    ccsr |= INHIBIT;
00628    cam16o(c, 30, 0, 17, ccsr);
00629 }
00630 
00631 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00632 INLINE void cam_inhibit_clear(const int c)
00633 {
00634    WORD ccsr;
00635 
00636    cam16i(c, 30, 0, 1, &ccsr);
00637    ccsr &= ~INHIBIT;
00638    cam16o(c, 30, 0, 17, ccsr);
00639 }
00640 
00641 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00642 INLINE void cam_crate_clear(const int c)
00643 {
00644    WORD ccsr;
00645 
00646    cam16i(c, 30, 0, 1, &ccsr);
00647    ccsr |= CLEAR;
00648    cam16o(c, 30, 0, 17, ccsr);
00649 }
00650 
00651 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00652 INLINE void cam_crate_zinit(const int c)
00653 {
00654    WORD ccsr;
00655 
00656    cam16i(c, 30, 0, 1, &ccsr);
00657    ccsr |= ZINIT;
00658    cam16o(c, 30, 0, 17, ccsr);
00659 }

00661 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00662 INLINE void cam_lam_enable(const int c, const int n)
00663 {
00664    DWORD mask;
00665 
00666    /* append slot n LAM(bitwise) to LAM mask in controller */
00667    cam24i(c, 30, 13, 1, &mask);
00668    mask |= (1 << (n - 1));
00669    cam24o(c, 30, 13, 17, mask);
00670 }
00671 
00672 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00673 INLINE void cam_lam_disable(const int c, const int n)
00674 {
00675    DWORD mask;
00676    /* disable LAM mask for slot n in controller */
00677    cam24i(c, 30, 13, 1, &mask);
00678    mask &= ~(1 << (n - 1));
00679    cam24o(c, 30, 13, 17, mask);
00680 }
00681 
00682 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00683 INLINE void cam_lam_read(const int c, DWORD * lam)
00684 {
00685    cam24i(c, 30, 12, 1, lam);
00686 }
00687 
00688 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00689 INLINE void cam_lam_clear(const int c, const int n)
00690 {
00691 }
